extendedInfo.description: Snap Secure provides the most advanced protection available to secure your life anywhere, anytime, from any device. â¢ Back up and restore the personal information on your phoneâ¢ Protect your data and device from dangerous viruses and sneaky appsâ¢ Know your phone and familyâs location at all timesâ¢ Set up emergency security features like a one touch Panic Button and Safety Zonesâ¢ Add up to six people and unlimited devices â¢ Receive cloud storage free!DOWNLOAD NOW! See for yourself what PCMAG.COM, FOXNEWS.COM, ANDROIDTAPP and more are raving about!Features include:AUTOMATIC BACKUP & RESTOREBacking up data is a no-brainer with Snap Secure. Simply choose what and when you want to back up and the rest is automatic. Restore information quickly should you get a new device.ANTIVIRUS PROTECTIONDangerous mobile viruses, malware and spyware can destroy your data and your device. Stay safe from these threats with automatic scans.PHONE LOCATIONLosing your phone is the WORST! Thatâs why we help you find it fast. Track a missing device on a map or trigger an Audio Ping alert to find it nearby (even when your phone is on silent!).REMOTE LOCK & WIPEIf your phone is lost or stolen, remotely lock your device or wipe its data to ensure your personal information doesnât fall into the wrong hands.REAL-TIME TRACKINGNot knowing where your family is can be stressful. Get peace of mind by viewing the locations of all your family members on a map. PANIC BUTTONEveryone needs an emergency plan. If youâre in a dangerous situation or need help, tap a panic button to send instant S.O.S. alerts with your location.SAFETY ZONESSet up virtual boundaries and receive real-time alerts when these zones are crossed. CALL & TEXT MONITORINGKnow whoâs contacting your family by monitoring the numbers calling and texting the people on your plan. BLACKLISTS & SPAM CONTROLCreate blacklists to block unwanted communication, like annoying spammers or child bullies.APP VISIBILITYProtect your personal information from sneaky apps and games by checking which ones are accessing your personal information.SIM GUARDIANWhen an unknown SIM card is inserted in your phone, we'll send an email to you with its location and the phone will be automatically locked down.CLOUD STORAGEAll that backed up data needs somewhere to go, which is why we offer up to 10 GB cloud storage for free with plans extending to 500 GB. REMOTE CAMERA CONTROLPhone lost or stolen? Remotely activate your deviceâs camera to get a visual of whatâs going on with it.PROTECTION FOR EVERYONEDon't leave anyone's safety to chance. Protect up to six people and an unlimited number of devices with one plan. This feature is available with Premium plans only.YOU'LL ALSO RECEIVE SNAP SYNC & SNAP MYLIFESnap Secure is part of the Snap One suite. This means that with your Snap Secure download you gain instant access to Snap Sync and Snap MyLife for free.AVAILABILITYâ¢ Snap Secure: Android, BlackBerry, iPad & iPhone, and webâ¢ Snap Sync: Android, iPad & iPhone, Windows Phone 8, Windows/Mac computers and webâ¢ Snap MyLife: Android, webDOWNLOAD NOW! SECURE YOUR LIFE.  EVERYWHERE.Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can decrease battery life.

reviews.title: Cannot remove from my device
reviews.comment: I have Norton Mobile and by mistake I installed Snap Secure instead of Norton Snap. Now, I cannot uninstall the product.
reviews.author: Sandor Batyi Jr.

reviews.title: Horrible App
reviews.comment: For some reason the app feature to contact people you\'ve selected in emergencies (by pressing the power button 7, 8 , or 9 times) is not capable of differentiating between those times when you tap the power button to simply use your phone vs tapping it the required # of times...thus it was alerting people every 9 taps.  CRAP  AND it is NOT free...do not be misled.
reviews.author: Jay Olle

reviews.title: Found my daughter\'s lost phone
reviews.comment: This app is serious peace of mind.
reviews.author: Michael OHara

reviews.title: Great,  but... Notifications?
reviews.comment: No notification in my status bar.. We need notifications showing continously in the status bar,  gives me some peace of mind.  Greag work otherwise
reviews.author: Richard Olafeyide

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Does not track phone. Paid for this. Emailed support numerous times, no response. 2 diff phones don\'t track. Awful!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only locator/backup worth paying for
reviews.comment: Verizon charges $10 just to locate and it\'s not even as good as this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Razr Max hd
reviews.comment: You can get better free. I purchased a lifetime membership.  It\'s hit and miss sometimes it works sometimes it doesn\'t. Frustrated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dumb
reviews.comment: Its stupid that u let people  download this app and waiste phone space but can\'t use app till u pay monthly or year bill

reviews.title: Good but need purchase
reviews.comment: There is no to purchase if you are sign up. I give you 1 star and does not to enter mobile security.
